definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
see 垃圾郵件|垃圾邮件[la1 ji1 you2 jian4]

sentences.english: It can be difficult to keep your email address spam-free.
sentences.chinese: 让你的电邮地址没有垃圾信件是困难的事。

sentences.english: All correspondence will be made via email only.
sentences.chinese: 所有通讯将以电邮方式进行。

sentences.english: Would you like to recieve our updates through Email?
sentences.chinese: 你希望我们用电邮知会你最新资讯吗？

sentences.english: If you do not want to receive our promotion material, please click here.
sentences.chinese: 假如阁下不希望再收到星岛日报优惠电邮，请按此处。

sentences.english: She's also e-mailing me daily to-do lists.
sentences.chinese: 她还把每日需打理事务的清单电邮给我。

sentences.english: Need to send out one last e-mail before you “officially” turn in?
sentences.chinese: “正式”睡觉前还需要发出最后一封电邮吗？

sentences.english: Removed email address cannot re-subscribe into our maillist, please use another email to re-subscribe.
sentences.chinese: 如须重新加入，请用其他电邮地址。

sentences.english: Honor he dating yourself by email misunderstanding, arrived at the restaurant, but only to appear.
sentences.chinese: 荣误会玥以电邮约会自己，到达餐厅却只见斯出现。

sentences.english: Notify me of follow-up comments via email.
sentences.chinese: 如有新文章請以电邮通知我。

sentences.english: I managed to locate a few qualified teachers on the net and contacted them via emails.
sentences.chinese: 我在网上找到几位合适的老师，并以电邮和他们联络。

sentences.english: Professors might not be using the cruddy university E-mail system.
sentences.chinese: 教授们可能不使用学校糟糕的电邮系统。

sentences.english: Think about your recipient and how they’d most likely write an e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 想想收件人的风格，以及他们最可能怎样写电邮。

sentences.english: He just surfed the Web and checked email all day.
sentences.chinese: 他整天做的事情只是上上网，收收电邮而已。

sentences.english: Period," Morgenstein said in an email response to questions from Reuters.
sentences.chinese: 摩根史腾在给路透社的电邮回复中说。

sentences.english: You sort of had the impression it was private.
sentences.chinese: 你们都有这样的印象，电邮是私人的。

sentences.english: If you would prefer not to receive e-newsletter from us, please click here.
sentences.chinese: 如阁下不想接收此电邮通讯，请按此处。

definition: newsletter/the news in brief/(Tw) SMS message
